text: Cars 3 is a 2017 American movie. It was made by Pixar, directed by Brian Fee, and produced by Kevin Reher. It is the third movie in the Cars movie series. The movie was released by Walt Disney Pictures on June 16, 2017. In the Cars trilogy, Cars 3 is the next movie after Cars 2, which is a sequel to the original Cars movie. == Plot == Lightning McQueen faces Jackson Storm, his high-tech rival who uses technology to win. He then makes friends with Cruz Ramirez, who needs training in racing, and the two learn many tricks from Smokey, who once trained Doc Hudson (Lightning's trainer in the original Cars movie). Lightning and Cruz then go to Florida to use what they learned to beat Storm, and in the end, both of them win. == Voice cast == * Owen Wilson as Lightning McQueen * Cristela Alonzo as Cruz Ramirez * Armie Hammer as Jackson Storm * Chris Cooper as Smokey * Larry the Cable Guy as Mater * Bonnie Hunt as Sally Carrera * Cheech Marin as Ramone * Jenifer Lewis as Flo * John Ratzenberger as Mack * Lloyd Sherr as Fillmore * Tony Shalhoub as Luigi * Guido Quaroni as Guido * Michael Wallis as Sheriff * Paul Dooley as Sarge * Katherine Helmond as Lizzie * Kerry Washington as Natalie Certain * Nathan Fillion as Sterling * Lea DeLaria as Miss Fritter == Related pages == * Cars (movie) * Cars 2 == References == == Other websites == * Category:2010s sports movies Category:2017 comedy movies Category:American 3D animated movies Category:American buddy comedy movies Category:American family movies Category:American sequel movies Category:American sports comedy movies Category:Cars (franchise) Category:Movies composed by Randy Newman Category:2010s sequel movies Category:Movies about automobiles Category:Movies set in California Category:2017 computer-animated movies
title: Cars 3
